column5: Flipping through today's Globe and Mail travel section and there's this two page ad spread on the NWT. Featured pretty prominently is Moosebunk's doppelganger  Even has the same Gore Tex jacket lol.  Hope NWT tourism lays out the red carpet for you next time yer up !
It was likely part of the deal when he won the essay contest for the trip.

I've been sitting on a ice report because of being immensely busy these past weeks with work (and fishing).  In that, I'll explain this Globe and Mail stuff...  It was kinda cool to do but it had nothing to do with Plummer's Lodges or last years trip contest.
